channel.title: Easy question fixing my .bat file
channel.description:
ok i have always had to fix my runservers and compilers because the code JAVA or -java does not work for me. it just opens and closes instantly. I used to know how to fix this but now i forgot how because i wiped my computer and lost and forgot what i put there. It was c:/ something my jdk version which is now 1.6.0_07 sorry i know this is very basic but its been awhile. +rep for help. here is the problem [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/6840/problemeu3.png[/img] and this is what it is its a runserver.bat file for a server and this is whats in it.
@echo off color 0a title AdvancedScape [b]java[/b] -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server PAUSE
the problem is in bold i need a alternative to that i used to know it it was something c:/ and to do with jdk1.6.0_07 I got dumb lol. [b]+rep if you help me get it working[/b]

item.title: Easy question fixing my .bat file
item.dc:creator: @mopar_user mopar user
item.description:
@mopar_user wrote:

no it can’t have just “java” in it i need the path there or something… i wish someone would help me already i cant play servers or anything now.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy question fixing my .bat file
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

try mine

@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause

Read full topic

ok i have always had to fix my runservers and compilers because the code JAVA or -java does not work for me.
it just opens and closes instantly. I used to know how to fix this but now i forgot how because i wiped my computer and lost and forgot what i put there. It was c:/ something my jdk version which is now 1.6.0_07

here is the problem
